p: Based on the aforementioned considerations, the possibility that SARS-CoV-2 can be identified in seminal fluid has important implications in reproductive medicine, especially regarding medically assisted reproduction and gamete cryopreservation, where there is a wide margin of uncertainty [ 14, 15]. The aim of the present paper is to summarize available evidence providing an official position statement of the Italian Society of Andrology and Sexual Medicine (SIAMS).
